doc.after: Late Umaru Musa Yar'Adua (born 1951 in Katsina, Katsina State, Nigeria) was the 2nd President of Nigeria's Fourth Republic. He served as governor of Katsina State in northern Nigeria between May 29, 1999 and May 28, 2007 . He was declared the winner of the controversial Nigerian general election of 2007, held on April 21, and was sworn in on May 29, 2007. He was a member of the ruling People's Democratic Party (PDP). (more...)
